entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Whiteshell
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:37 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:20 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:20 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:20 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 11:20 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 13. Forecast issued 11:20 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 11:20 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 11:20 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:20 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:20 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 11:20 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8. Forecast issued 11:20 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:20 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 11:20 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
